scripts.build: rm -rf dist; find . -name '*.ts' -not -name '*.d.ts' -not -path './node_modules/*'  | xargs esbuild --outdir=dist --platform=node --format=cjs; cp index.js dist/index.js
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting this plugin...'; eslint lib tests --ext .ts; echo 'Plugin linted successfully'
scripts.doc: npm run build; trap 'Ran all test suites.' SIGINT; npm run doc:generate; node scripts/generate-docs-for-untested-rules.js; npm run doc:format; node scripts/generate-rules-table.js
scripts.doc:generate: rm -rf docs/rules; DOCGEN=1 npm run test
scripts.prepare: npm run lint; npm run test; npm run build
